ModMetaData.name: Racc Race (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Xen
ModMetaData.description:
Update of Xens mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=2018388533
[img]https://i.imgur.com/wtwHAQu.png[/img]
Support-chat: https://invite.gg/mlie
Non-steam version: https://github.com/emipa606/RaccRace
--- Original Description --- The Racc are a raccoon humanoid species obsessed with intelligence and espionage. Uses the Alien Framework V2.0 by Erdelf and co.
Custom backstories and name generators
Art (Heads) by Nackblad and Xen.
